description: This is a great pie to cook in early summer, when the rhubarb and strawberry seasons happily coincide.
name: Rhubarb & Strawberry Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 45 g lard or white vegetable fat

recipeInstructions.text: Bake on the baking sheet for 20 minutes. Reduce the temperature to 180°C and bake for another 30-35 minutes until the crust is browned. Test the fruit with a skewer and if it needs longer but the top could burn, loosely cover with foil. Transfer to a wire rack, and let cool.

Bake on the baking sheet for 20 minutes. Reduce the temperature to 180°C and bake for another 30-35 minutes until the crust is browned. Test the fruit with a skewer and if it needs longer but the top could burn, loosely cover with foil. Transfer to a wire rack, and let cool.
